experience.title: Analyst
experience.description: SMI Delivery- Works on various social listening projects specific to Brand Monitoring, Digital Landscaping of companies and brands, Digital Patient Journey reports, Google AdWords, Trend Monitoring, Corporate Conference Monitoring and KOL Identification- Works with pharmaceutical clients providing solutions specific to customer centric business problems by generating insights and reports specific to therapy area- Develops social media marketing strategy, execution, and analysis through content and competition analysis in accordance with clients' overall marketing goals- Experience in analysis of social media data across a wide spectrum of therapeutic areas and pharmaceutical brands
